titleInfo.title: Price-dispersed preferences and C 1 mean demand

mods.abstract: In this paper we introduce the concept of price-dispersed preferences. Moreover we state conditions under which economies with price-dispersed preference distributions have a continuously differentiable mean demand function.

bibliographicCitation.dgps: Dierker, E., Dierker, H. & Trockel, W. (1984). Price-dispersed preferences and C 1 mean demand. Journal of Mathematical Economics, 13(1), 11-42. Elsevier BV. doi:10.1016/0304-4068(84)90022-3.
